main event: A resident of Lake Ozark, Missouri reported observing a metallic, disc-shaped object with a dome on top, which hovered and then accelerated rapidly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object appeared to be larger than a conventional aircraft, measuring approximately 50 to 60 feet in diameter., The sighting occurred around 10:00 PM and lasted for about 2-3 minutes., The object made no sound during the observation., It was seen at an altitude of approximately 500 ft and reflected a brilliant light., The object maneuvered rapidly from side to side before climbing at a sharp angle.
